channel.title: Help with member items
channel.description: well the subject is pretty explanatory. All i want to know is how to make an item require membership to wear

item.title: Help with member items
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Add this into your client.java

if (playerIsMember == 0 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 0) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You have to be a member to wield this."); dropsitem = false; }
This is for the weapon slot. If you want to change the slot, just change playerWeapon to the slot you choose.

Thats the easy way to do it… if you want the more complicated way, I’ll be making a tutorial on it. This code removes the slot as soon as you put it on, but there is still a delay. With the tut I give, the server won’t even allow you to wield it to begin with.

Read full topic
